## The Replication Crisis

::::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
### The Problem

-   Many famous findings couldn't be replicated
-   Small sample sizes
-   P-hacking concerns
-   Publication bias
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
### The Impact

-   Loss of confidence in findings
-   Questions about methodology
-   Need for better oversight
-   Call for reform
:::
